description:
Seeking to become the third general of Asura, Gammon, Asura of Sasori, takes Rock`s group hostage in order to ambush Kenshiro. Kenshiro sees the suffering in Rock`s eyes, and springs the trap deliberately in order to draw the real culprit, Gammon, out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ils ne veulent rien savoir ! Les sept cavaliers attaquent Kenshiro !!
Men Beyond Reasons! The Band of Seven Attacks Kenshiro!!
問答無用の男達! 遂に荒野の七人がケンを襲う!!
